text: If you want to see the manifesto of "FeedLand", the goal we're aiming this product at, just read the "Textcasting" doc. That's what it's all about. I needed to focus our work on this project, and I had learned from many years of trying to peer with social networks, only to give up in 2017, that what's needed is a new kind of social network, different from the ones we had before. One that puts writers at the center, and where there's an unbounded variety of tools for both writing and reading, very much unlike the networks that exist that exert heavy control on the format of writing. It might not be the network for everyone, and that's fine. I just think the web has huge untapped potential as a writer's medium.
